document.full_text: turkish prime minister tayyip erdogan accused france of violating the freedom of religion on wednesday after paris began enforcing a law barring muslim women from wearing full face veils in public.
document.title: turkish pm attacks france for ban on full face veil
lines_and_colors: turkish prime minister tayyip erdogan accused france of violating the freedom of religion on wednesday after paris began enforcing a law barring muslim women from wearing full face veils in public.
